document.full_text: the danger of an uneven economic recovery in europe has fallen despite concerns about the patchy nature of the upturn, european central bank governing council member ewald nowotny said on monday.
document.title: danger of uneven europe recovery has fallen: nowotny
lines_and_colors: the danger of an uneven economic recovery in europe has fallen despite concerns about the patchy nature of the upturn, european central bank governing council member ewald nowotny said on monday.
